changeSet.author: pwadmore
changeSet.comment: Remove the staging user when running on Azure
changeSet.sql: IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.database_principals WHERE name = N'${fffsWebPortalStagingDbUsername}') DROP USER ${fffsWebPortalStagingDbUsername}

rollback.sql: IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.database_principals WHERE name = N'${fffsWebPortalStagingDbUsername}') CREATE USER ${fffsWebPortalStagingDbUsername} WITH PASSWORD = '${fffsWebPortalStagingDbPassword}', DEFAULT_SCHEMA = FFF_STAGING
